text: This is a family tree of the Emperors of Japan (tenno)Nussbaum, Louis- Frédéric. (2005). "Tennō" in Japan encyclopedia, pp. 960. from Jimmu to the present day. The legendary genealogy of the emperors includes Shinto deities. The traditional order of succession begins with Emperor Jimmu.Nussbaum, Louis- Frédéric. (2005). "Traditional Order of Tennō" in Japan encyclopedia, pp. 962-963. In the graphic chart, the names of Jimmu and his successors are highlighted in yellow. The ordinal numbers of the Japanese monarchs are in red; and these are also highlighted in yellow. The pretenders of the Nanboku- chō period are highlighted in beige. ==Chart== == Related pages == * Succession to the Japanese throne * List of emperors of Japan ==Notelist== == References == ;General * ;Specific ==Other websites== * Imperial Household Agency (Kunaicho), Genealogy of the Emperors of Japan Japanese Category:Lists of Japanese people
title: Family tree of Japanese monarchs
